name: Infinity Weather (Beta): Minamalist weather, for free.
description: Welcome to Infinity Weather Beta! We are exited to announce our latest addition to our ever-growing portfolio of products, Infinity Weather. We have build this using standard Web Technologies, so you can have Infinity Weather on all your devices! Infinity Weather is a minimalist weather application, helping you get straight to your weather information without ads or a cluttered interface. We look forward to adding more features as we take Infinity Weather out of beta! And the best part is: Weather is completely free, with no ads and the highest level of privacy. Our source code can be viewed at https://github.com/agastyamishra/agastyamishra.github.io/tree/main/infinity-weather.
